description: This file defines the IUserSettings interface within the WPEFramework project, including nested INotification interface, methods for user settings such as language preferences, captions, privacy mode, and notification registration. It appears to be a header file declaring interfaces and constants for user settings management and notifications.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: An interface for managing user settings such as audio description, languages, captions, and privacy mode.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: A nested interface within IUserSettings for receiving notifications when user settings change.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for user settings changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the preferred audio languages in ISO 639-2 codes.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves the list of preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language in BCP 47 format.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Retrieves the preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode, either sharing or not sharing data.

methods.name: GetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Retrieves the current privacy mode setting.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
